/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the bright sunlight, is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
